articles.title: US same-sex marriage ruling could influence Australian debate: MPs
articles.description: Federal politicians say the United States Supreme Court ruling that same-sex couples have a fundamental right to marry could influence the debate in Australia.

articles.title: UK must prepare for many citizens killed in Tunisia, David Cameron says
articles.description: UK prime minister David Cameron warns the country to prepare for the fact that "many" of those killed in the attack on a Tunisian beach resort were British.

articles.title: Surfer injured in massive wave off WA's Margaret River coast
articles.description: A surfer is injured while being towed into massive waves off the Margaret River coast in Western Australia's south-west.

articles.title: Matildas head into Japan clash in top condition and confident despite underdog status
articles.description: Matildas coach Alen Stajcic says his side's poor recent record against quarter-finals opponent Japan will count for little on Sunday.

articles.title: Liberal Party base supports motion to eliminate race references in constitution
articles.description: The Liberal Party base sends Prime Minister Tony Abbott a strong message on race issues which could have significant implications for his push to recognise Aboriginal people in the constitution.

articles.title: Police search for person involved in deaths of three in rural NSW
articles.description: Police confirm they are looking for a person believed to be involved in the suspicious deaths of three people on a rural property in central New South Wales.

articles.title: Waratahs' Super Rugby defence over in semi-final loss to Highlanders
articles.description: The Waratahs' Super Rugby title defence ends at the semi-final stage after losing 35-17 to the Highlanders.

articles.title: Mitchell regrets making injection gesture mocking Essendon over ASADA troubles
articles.description: Hawthorn midfielder Sam Mitchell says his mock injection gesture aimed at Essendon players will not be repeated on an AFL field.

articles.title: Queensland CSG jobs being shed as construction boom ends abruptly
articles.description: The mayor rural Queensland's Western Downs region says the coal seam gas construction boom has ended quicker than expected.

articles.title: Coronation of Tonga's King Tupou VI begins with ancient kava ceremony
articles.description: Tonga begins 11 days of celebrations to mark the coronation of monarch King Tupou VI with an ancient kava ceremony and gifts of pigs and yams from the country's chiefs.

articles.title: 'Flying' paint tin which ruined Maserati interior among oddest SA insurance claims
articles.description: A tin of paint that "liberally splashed" a Maserati interior after the driver swerved to avoid a dog has led to an expensive insurance claim in South Australia.
